I see that Lombok is being used but the version comes from Spring Boot dependencies. Let me check what version of Lombok Spring Boot 2.3.2.RELEASE uses and if we need to override it. The issue is that older versions of Lombok don't support Java 17. We need to add a Lombok version property in the parent pom.xml to use a version that supports Java 17.
